::Snitch::

Snitch pushes a button on his data pad and a plastic printout pops out of
the data pad which Bloodystrike is holding. �Yes, please bring back as soon
as can, need these things we do. Weapons you need. Faster you go faster you
get weapons. Yes? Yes? Go, go! Get out of here, hurry back with payment.
ENMP field upen for your, give weapons back, you come back quick, yes, yes.�
He scurries up the tree and is gone.
